text.section: A building principal may direct employees to attend any lEP meeting or 504 meeting that occurs outside the normal teacher working day. Employees who attend five (5) IEP/504 meetings outside the normal teacher working day in one school year will receive a payment of $100 in the last pay in June. Any employee who attends more than five (5) IEP/504 meetings outside the normal working day will receive a payment of $20 per meeting for each such meeting over five (5) meetings in the last pay in June.
